product.title: HerStyler - Colorful Seasons 8 1.25" Flat Iron Straightener Purple
product.description: HerStyler - Colorful Seasons 8 1.25" Straightener Purple HerStyler Colorful Seasons 8 1.25" Flat Iron Straightener Purple is the ultimate fashion accessory. Get your hair silky smooth in minutes! With 100% ceramic floating plates, the Colorful Seasons flat iron generates 6x more negative ions than a regular flat iron. Solid 1.25" ceramic plates allows you to straighten, flip and curl hair. The Colorful Seasons flat iron is the ultimate fashion accessory. Get your hair silky smooth in minutes! With 100% ceramic floating plates, the Colorful Seasons flat iron generates 6x more negative ions than a regular flat iron.

product.description_full:
HerStyler - Colorful Seasons 8 1.25" Straightener Purple HerStyler Colorful Seasons 8 1.25" Flat Iron Straightener Purple is the ultimate fashion accessory. Get your hair silky smooth in minutes! With 100% ceramic floating plates, the Colorful Seasons flat iron generates 6x more negative ions than a regular flat iron. Solid 1.25" ceramic plates allows you to straighten, flip and curl hair. The Colorful Seasons flat iron is the ultimate fashion accessory. Get your hair silky smooth in minutes! With 100% ceramic floating plates, the Colorful Seasons flat iron generates 6x more negative ions than a regular flat iron. * Features 360-degree swivel cord, floating ceramic plates, adjustable temperature and 1-year warranty
 * Suits all types of hair, from long, fragile or thin to short, coarse, wavy or thick
 * Transforms your hair from dull, curly or frizzy to straight, stylish and chic
 * Presents highly consistent, salon-quality results from root to tip
 * Travel friendly and portable

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
